title: Chocolate Waffles Recipe
description: These chocolate waffles are a favorite. They offer a fun flavor variation on traditional waffles with a touch of cocoa. They are light and fluffy.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Breakfast and Brunch Waffle Recipes Chocolate Waffles 4.4 (233) 190 Reviews 41 Photos I always begged my mom to make chocolate waffles for me when I was growing up. Now I make them for my two daughters and they absolutely love them! By Allrecipes Member Updated on March 31, 2025 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 41 41 41 41 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 15 mins Total Time: 25 mins Servings: 10 Yield: 10 waffles Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 10 servings Waffles: 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour ½ cup white sugar 3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder 3 teaspoons baking powder ½ teaspoon salt 1 cup milk 2 large eggs 4 tablespoons butter, melted Hard Sauce: 1 tablespoon butter, softened ¾ cup confectioners' sugar ½ teaspoon vanilla extract 1 teaspoon milk Other: nonstick cooking spray Directions Gather all ingredients. Preheat a waffle iron. Allrecipes / Abbey Littlejohn Make waffles: Stir together flour, sugar, cocoa, baking powder, and salt in a large mixing bowl. Stir in milk, eggs, and butter until the mixture is smooth. Allrecipes / Abbey Littlejohn Make hard sauce: stir together softened butter, confectioners' sugar, vanilla extract, and milk. Sauce should be fairly stiff. Set aside. Allrecipes / Abbey Littlejohn Spray preheated waffle iron with nonstick cooking spray. Pour waffle mix onto hot waffle iron. Cook until golden brown. Allrecipes / Abbey Littlejohn Serve hot with hard sauce. Allrecipes / Abbey Littlejohn I Made It Print 310 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 226 Calories 8g Fat 36g Carbs 4g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 10 Calories 226 % Daily Value * Total Fat 8g 10% Saturated Fat 4g 22% Cholesterol 54mg 18% Sodium 290mg 13% Total Carbohydrate 36g 13% Dietary Fiber 1g 4% Total Sugars 21g Protein 4g 9% Calcium 101mg 8% Iron 1mg 8% Potassium 97mg 2% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Chocolate Waffles 01 of 41 Photo by  Allrecipes / Abbey Littlejohn 02 of 41 Photo by  narciso17 11/13/2023 03 of 41 Photo by  CleverSnap8799 06/24/2023 This recipe is super easy and yummy. My kids (3 and 5) made these for breakfast and we used our mini waffle maker. We added chocolate sauce and marshmallows. Thanks so much! 04 of 41 Photo by  josieradle 06/01/2023 05 of 41 Photo by  FeistyYolk1407 03/01/2023 These turned out great. A lot of people saying they're not chocolate enough or sweet enough, waffles are meant to be topped with sweet items so they themselves aren't supposed to be super sweet. These were fluffy and did taste great as the recipe was. Thank you! 06 of 41 Photo by  HeartyHoney6723 01/15/2023 I made the chances Lissalu suggested, they are great! Thank you 07 of 41 Photo by  Elaine K Kentner 11/25/2022 Ohhh so delicious!! The hard sauce is a bit too sweet but the combo taste great together 08 of 41 Photo by  cindy 02/14/2022 My family loved these waffles! I added vanilla extract and Chia/Hemp/Flax seeds and a few mini chocolate chips. Oh yes they were great. 09 of 41 Photo by  Spiffygirl 11/24/2020 10 of 41 Photo by  tankonzen 09/07/2020 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Carlie's Chocolate Oatmeal Waffles 15 Ratings Gluten-Free Chocolate Zucchini Waffles 3 Ratings Best Vegan Chocolate Oatmeal Waffles 2 Ratings Gingerbread Waffles with Hot Chocolate Sauce 64 Ratings Diana's Chocolate Waffles 30 Ratings Gluten-Free Chocolate Chip Cookie Waffles 3 Ratings Mini Waffle Pops with Candy Sprinkles Mini Waffle Pops with Dark Chocolate, Roasted Peanuts, and Flaked Salt Coconut Chocolate Chip Waffles 12 Ratings Waffles 5,385 Ratings Norwegian Waffles 183 Ratings Rice Waffles 3 Ratings Almond Flour Waffles 130 Ratings Gluten Free Waffles!! 19 Ratings Gluten-Free Waffles 37 Ratings Easy Vegan Waffles 1 Rating Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Allrecipes Member
